txt.en: Imping, one of the last Rohirrim saw mills along the Entwash, has fallen to invaders. Ethelbryt has tasked you with defeating the leader of these invaders in the hopes that such a demoralizing blow would weaken the enemy and allow the Rohirrim to retake the mill.

Long have the ruins of Parphád remained closed to the inquisitive and invaders alike. Not content with this, invaders have breached the gates of the ruins and threaten the relics contained within. Ascbert has tasked you with preserving the relics and texts within, even if that effort means confronting the invaders.

The Iserngraf is a rich source of much needed ore in Rohan. Mines this rich are sought by many and control of it is critical to the Rohirrim. Unfortunately, it has fallen under attack and the miners have been driven out. Frithnoth has asked you to do what you can do discourage the invaders within.
